entry.title: Severo Aguilar (Wikipedia — did you know?)
entry.content: ... that following his election to the Constituent Assembly, Severo Aguilar (pictured) had to trek four hours and hitch a ride on a truck in order to get to the assembly's headquarters in Sucre?

entry.title: Jihad Rehab (Wikipedia — did you know?)
entry.content: ... that the documentary film Jihad Rehab features interviews with former inmates from the Guantanamo Bay detention camp who are now in the Care Rehabilitation Center, a “jihad rehab” in Saudi Arabia?

entry.title: Malabo Mosque (Wikipedia — did you know?)
entry.content: ... that Malabo Mosque cost about two billion Central African CFA francs to build?

entry.title: Sylvia Wu (Wikipedia — did you know?)
entry.content: ... that Cary Grant taught Sylvia Wu how to make shredded chicken salad?

entry.title: When We Were Young (Wikipedia — did you know?)
entry.content: ... that Adele's artwork for "When We Were Young" features a picture of her as a child?

entry.title: Jutta Fleck (Wikipedia — did you know?)
entry.content: ... that Jutta Fleck protested for six months in front of border guards at Checkpoint Charlie for her daughters' release from East Germany?

entry.title: Pharah (Wikipedia — did you know?)
entry.content: ... that the combat suit Pharah wears in Overwatch bears a strong resemblance to those featured in mecha anime?

entry.title: Hurricane Shark (Wikipedia — did you know?)
entry.content: ... that "the Hurricane Shark is real"?
